search_results.snippet: Joseph Clifford Montana Jr. (born June 11, 1956), nicknamed Joe Cool, The Comeback Kid, is a former American football quarterback who played in the National Football League (NFL) for 16 seasons, primarily with the San Francisco 49ers. He also briefly played for the Kansas City Chiefs.
